description: Baked fried brown rice made with sriracha, pineapple, cashews, and edamame.
keywords: Baked Fried Brown Rice, brown rice recipe
name: Baked Fried Brown Rice
recipeIngredient: 1 c. pineapple chunks (I used fresh, but I'm sure canned would be fine)
2 tbsp. coconut oil (melted (peanut, vegetable, or canola oil would work too)
1 tbsp. sriracha (more for spicier fried rice, less if you like it milder)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rice, green onions, pineapple, edamame, and cashews in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk together oil, soy sauce, and sriracha. Pour oil mixture over rice mixture and stir until well-combined.

Spray a rimmed baking sheet with oil or cooking spray. Pour rice onto sheet in an even layer. Bake for 45-60 minutes, stirring about every 20 minutes, or until rice is dry and just beginning to get crispy. Serve with additional soy sauce and sriracha, if desired.
